[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/move_tool/aptos_debug_natives.rs] [Function: aptos_debug_natives()] [Missing natives] If critical security natives are missing from the returned table due to build configuration errors, can this cause transaction validation to fail or be bypassed? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/move_tool/aptos_debug_natives.rs] [Function: aptos_debug_natives()] [Context injection] Can malicious native contexts be injected through the extension hook configured by configure_for_unit_test(), giving test code access to production data or capabilities? [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/move_tool/aptos_debug_natives.rs] [Function: aptos_debug_natives()] [Null parameter] If native_gas_parameters or misc_gas_params contain null/default values, does this cause panics or undefined behavior in native function execution? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/move_tool/aptos_debug_natives.rs] [Function: aptos_debug_natives()] [Type confusion] Can type mismatches in NativeGasParameters or MiscGasParameters cause memory corruption or undefined behavior when passed to unsafe native code? (High)
